short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Events, Births, Deaths this day in History!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: thisDay is a daily history chrome extension, that shows current events, births, deaths of the day. It has a calender that allows you to get events etc, of any day. Allow users to download reports as a pdf file.
